title: SWE-Mirror: Scaling Issue-Resolving Datasets by Mirroring Issues Across Repositories
summary: This paper addresses the challenge of creating large-scale verifiable training datasets for issue-resolving tasks. It proposes SWE-Mirror, a method to scale issue-resolving datasets by mirroring issues across repositories, maximizing the utilization of existing Gym environments and rich data from human-reported problems.
usefulness_reason: The title and summary explicitly mention "datasets" and "scaling issue-resolving datasets", which directly relates to the "Contextual dataset" aspect of the query. While it doesn't mention spatio-temporal or point processes, the focus on dataset creation and utilization makes it relevant.
